text: (Kare-ra ni) itte yaru ga ī. ` (Yoi koto o) okonae. Arrā wa anata gata no okonai o gozonji de ara reru. Kare no shito to shinja-tachi mo mata (mite iru). Yagate anata gata wa, yūgen-kai to genshō-kai o shitte ora reru kata ni kisa reru. Sonotoki kare wa, anata gata ni sono okonatta koto o tsuge shiraseru
